attributes.action: outlaw the use of the Union Flag by political parties such as the BNP who use the Flag to imply their policies represent the views of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Political parties such as the British National Party should not be allowed to use the Union Flag to imply their policies are in the nations' best interest, or that they are supported by the United Kingdom as a whole. 
The people of the UK should be able to feel pride in their country and their Flag without appearing to support fascism, racism or the parties which condone those beliefs. Britain has always been a pluralistic and diverse society, and a pride in our Flag should also mean a pride in these aspects, which make our country something worth being proud of.
